eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new PIE speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new PIE speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkFulfilled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new PIE speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: ChainlinkCancelled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new PIE speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: getChainlinkToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the LINK token. This is the public implementation for chainlinkTokenAddress, which is an internal method of the ChainlinkClient contract.

functionDecorators.name: fulfillPushReport
functionDecorators.description: Calls the DSA contract's pushReport method with the response from the oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID that was generated for the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The answer provided by the oracle.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLink
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to withdraw any LINK balance on the contract.

functionDecorators.name: cancelRequest
functionDecorators.description: Call this method if no response is received within 5 minutes.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID that was generated for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: The payment specified for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackFunctionId
parameterDecorators.description: The bytes4 callback function ID specified for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _expiration
parameterDecorators.description: The expiration generated for the request to cancel.

functionDecorators.name: setAuthorization
functionDecorators.description: Called by the owner to permission other addresses to generate new requests to oracles.

parameterDecorators.name: _requester
parameterDecorators.description: the address whose permissions are being set.

parameterDecorators.name: _allowed
parameterDecorators.description: boolean that determines whether the requester is permissioned or not.

functionDecorators.name: getChainlinkOracle
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the stored oracle contract address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
